item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (744 points | 221 comments)
2. NanoGPT (124M) quality in 3.25B training tokens (vs. 10B) (21 points | 2 comments)
3. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant modal shift from road to rail (172 points | 106 comments)
4. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (36 points | 9 comments)
5. The ACF plugin on the WordPress directory has been taken over by WordPress.org (181 points | 42 comments)
6. PayPal will automatically share data about you to participating stores (47 points | 9 comments)
7. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (498 points | 76 comments)
8. Apple macOS 15 Sequoia is officially Unix (24 points | 8 comments)
9. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (53 points | 9 comments)
10. DuckStation (86 points | 29 comments)
11. AMD's Turin: 5th Gen EPYC Launched (291 points | 138 comments)
12. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
13. Turkish language has a gossip tense (94 points | 68 comments)
14. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (334 points | 231 comments)
15. Researchers Find Cannibalized Victim of 19th-Century Arctic Voyage (41 points | 12 comments)
16. Analyzing New Unique Identifier Formats (UUIDv6, UUIDv7, and UUIDv8) (11 points | 4 comments)
17. Steam's new disclaimer reminds everyone that you don't own your games (10 points | 6 comments)
18. First Greenhouse Gas Plumes Detected with NASA-Designed Instrument (9 points | discuss)
19. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (108 points | 22 comments)
20. Ion and Molecular Sieving with Ultrathin Polydopamine Nanomembranes (11 points | 1 comment)
21. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What Have Researchers Learned? – Illinois Fishing Hub (42 points | 14 comments)
22. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (19 points | 24 comments)
23. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (241 points | 61 comments)
24. Nvidia Stock Rises. AMD's New AI Chip Is Not Competitive (24 points | 23 comments)
25. Six transplant patients in Brazil contract HIV from infected organs (127 points | 53 comments)
26. Conway's Gradient of Life (376 points | 40 comments)
27. Swarm, a new agent framework by OpenAI (174 points | 68 comments)
28. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (334 points | 47 comments)
29. Tiny Drones Do Distributed Mapping (34 points | 1 comment)
30. Choosing solitude (54 points | 43 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
